artist: Artist: Toyohara Chikanobu; Publisher: Fukuda Hatsujirō
creditline: Bequest of Louis W. Hill, Jr.
description: three sheets joined together and folded in album: two female figures in sumptuous dress in dramatic poses on tatami mat; male figures with fans watch on elevated verandah at L with others behind closed screen
markings: Seal (red) LRQ: Yo_ | Seals (black) LLQ: Printed and published by Fukuda Hatsujiro_ in June of Meiji 30
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
title: Prostitutes
